dict.string: #!/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Versions/1.8/usr/bin/ruby require ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH'] + '/lib/textmate' puts "Using " + `"${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" -e'puts "ruby-" + RUBY_VERSION.to_s'`.chomp + " / " + `"${TM_ERB:=erb}" --version 2>&1`.chomp result = `"${TM_ERB:=erb}" -T - -x | "${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" -c 2>&1` puts result TextMate.go_to :line => $1 if result =~ /-:(\d+):/
